Learn something in every new tab. Every time you open a new tab we'll show you a different awesome fact.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Chrome extension and setting my Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service. The search features within the extension will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

Permission required:
Replace the page you see when opening a new tab
